snippet.title: Andreas VII
snippet.description:
This is a video of a play-through of a horror game I am releasing to itch without commentary, mainly because the game has a lot of puzzles and they are Not Easy so this should help people if they get stuck, or if you just prefer consuming games like this this way that's neat too. 

here's the game page (might not be up depending on when you see this): https://unseconds.itch.io/andreas-vii

Timestamps:
1:34 - past opening
4:11 - trajectory
4:55 - pressurization
5:47 - velocity
6:05 - velocity issue
6:22 - SRBs
6:57 - roll pitch yaw
7:54  - connection issue/symmetry puzzle
12:06 - post astronaut motivations monologue
14:26 - palette change/rebirth puzzle
15:20 - ending conversation
